meanings.definition: The action or process of recognizing or being recognized.
meanings.sent1: Her recognitions at work made her feel appreciated.
meanings.sent2: The recognitions of his talent were well-deserved.
meanings.sent3: During the award ceremony, his recognitions brought tears of joy.
meanings.sent4: In the world of sports, winning the championship is the ultimate recognition.
meanings.sent5: The recognitions from her peers motivated her to work even harder.

meanings.definition: Acknowledgment of something's existence, validity, or legality.
meanings.sent1: The recognitions of the new law were met with mixed reactions.
meanings.sent2: His recognitions of the contract were crucial for its approval.
meanings.sent3: The recognitions of the mysterious creature puzzled the scientists.
meanings.sent4: The recognitions of the ancient artifact shed light on its history.
meanings.sent5: The recognitions of the missing document delayed the project.
